scripts.test:ssh: set -e; fn () { target=$1; shift; secret=$(ssh $target sudo bbb-conf --secret); env=$(echo "$secret" | sed -e 's/^ *URL: /BBB_URL=/' -e '/^BBB_URL/s/$/api/' -e 's/^ *Secret: /BBB_SECRET=/' -e '/^BBB/p' -e d); env $env npx playwright test $@; }; fn
scripts.rewrite-snapshots:
read -p 'CAUTION: You will delete ALL testing folders containing snapshots and run the tests to rewrite these files.
Proceed? (y/n) ' confirm && test $confirm = 'y' && sh core/scripts/rewrite-snapshots.sh
